Package control

Class PetrinetViewerController

java.lang.Object
control.PetrinetViewerController
public class PetrinetViewerController extends Object

Controller handling a petrinet model.

It also creates and handles a reachability graph model linked to petrinet (see ReachabilityGraph).

      public PetrinetViewerController(File file, ToolbarChangedListener toolbarListener, ToolbarMode toolbarMode) throws PetrinetException
      Instantiates a new petrinet controller.
      Parameters:
      file - the file that is loaded
      toolbarListener - listener for highlighting toolbar buttons
      toolbarMode - toolbar mode to be used
      Throws:
      PetrinetException - thrown by PNMLParser

      public void resetPetrinet()
      Resets the petrinet -> sets it to the initial state. The initial state is reset when petrinet is modified.

    • resetReachabilityGraph

      public void resetReachabilityGraph()

    • onReachabilityGraphNodeClicked

      public void onReachabilityGraphNodeClicked(String id)
      Handles clicks in the reachability graph -> sets petrinet to the state that has been clicked and updates reachability graph model.
      Parameters:
      id - element that has been clicked

    • onPetrinetNodeClicked

      public PetrinetElement onPetrinetNodeClicked(String id)
      Handles clicks in the petrinet graph -> if the element was a transition, fire it; otherwise return element for graph to handle it.
      Parameters:
      id - dlement that has been clicked
      Returns:
      the element, if it was of type Place, null otherwise (or also if it hasn't been found).
